mapper.select: -- 주변 진료소 조회 SELECT *, (6371*acos(cos(radians(${lat}))*cos(radians(clinic_lat))*cos(radians(clinic_lon) -radians(${lon}))+sin(radians(${lat}))*sin(radians(clinic_lat)))) AS distance FROM clinic HAVING distance <= ${distance} -- 거리(1 = 1km) 이내 ORDER BY distance
mapper.update: -- UPDATE 보건소 정보 UPDATE clinic SET clinic_lat = #{lat}, clinic_lon = #{lon} WHERE clinic_location = '${key}'
